title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
8-9:

  • Contains a clear, well-developed thesis that addresses the ways in which the ideas of the Enlightenment contributed to the origins constitutional government in the United States

  • Develops the thesis with substantial and relevant historical information

  • Provides effective analysis the ways in which the ideas of the Enlightenment contributed to the origins of constitutional government in the United States; treatment of the two parts may be somewhat uneven

  • May contain minor errors that do not detract from the quality of the answer

  • Is well organized and well written

5-7:

  • Contains a partially developed thesis that analysis the ways in which the ideas of the Enlightenment contributed to the origins of constitutional government in the United States

  • Supports the thesis with some relevant historical information

  • Provides some analysis of the ways in which the ideas of the Enlightenment contributed to the origins of constitutional government in the United States, but treatment of the two parts may be uneven

  • May contain errors that do not seriously detract from the quality of the essay

  • Has acceptable organization and writing

2-4:

  • Contains an unfocused or limited thesis, or simply paraphrases the question

  • Provides minimal relevant information, or lists facts with little or no application to the question

  • May address the question only partially, with limited or no analysis

  • May be poorly organized and/or written

0-1:

  • Lacks a thesis or simply restates the question

  • Demonstrates an incompetent response, or is completely off-topic

  • Has numerous errors

  • Is organized and/or written so poorly hat it inhibits understanding

The “—” Essay:

  • Is completely blank
